text: Apruebo Dignidad (; in English, Approve Dignity, AD) is a left-wing to far- left Chilean electoral coalition. It was created on 11 January 2021, by the Equality Party, Broad Front and Chile Digno. It was created for the Constitutional Convention election. ==References== Category:Politics of Chile Category:2021 establishments Category:2020s establishments in South America Category:21st-century establishments in Chile
title: Apruebo Dignidad
